Title: A Troll in Central Park
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical
Writer: Stu Krieger (screenplay), Don Bluth (story), Gary Goldman (story), John Pomeroy (story), T.J. Kuenster (story), Stu Krieger (story)
Actors: Dom DeLuise, Cloris Leachman, Charles Nelson Reilly, Jonathan Pryce
Plot: An evil witch banishes a flower loving troll named Stanley, to New York City, where he befriends two young children.
